DOC.brief_summary: In this randomized controlled trial the utility of capnography gets evaluated. Hypoxemia may occur during sedation with midazolam and propofol. Whether hypoxemia may be prevented by an additional capnographic monitoring is subject of the study.
DOC.criteria: 18 Years and older Scheduled for PEG with propofol sedation No informed consent ASA V Emergency endoscopy Preexisting hypotension, bradycardia or hypoxemia
DOC.keyword: hypoxaemia - capnography - integrated pulmonary index - PEG
